examples.description: uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes
examples.full_description: Styling the Jumbotron with class selectors uses an external stylesheet via a <link> with rel and href attributes

examples.description: creates a rounded border of 5px with an element class selector of div.jumbotron
examples.full_description: Styling the Jumbotron with class selectors creates a rounded border of 5px with an element class selector of div.jumbotron

examples.description: adds a background color of #e9ecef, a 10px padding, and centers the text via an element class selector of div.jumbotron
examples.full_description: Styling the Jumbotron with class selectors adds a background color of #e9ecef, a 10px padding, and centers the text via an element class selector of div.jumbotron

examples.description: makes the font-size of the h1 in a jumbotron 60px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron h1"
examples.full_description: Styling the Jumbotron with class selectors makes the font-size of the h1 in a jumbotron 60px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron h1"

examples.description: styles paragraphs in a jumbotron with a font-size of 20px, a 40px left right padding, and a line height of 40px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron p"
examples.full_description: Styling the Jumbotron with class selectors styles paragraphs in a jumbotron with a font-size of 20px, a 40px left right padding, and a line height of 40px via a nested class element selector of ".jumbotron p"
